title: Club owner can't access club?
body:
Hi I created a club for my mates called Omnislash to the face (tag OMNIX)
A few weeks ago I noticed that I wasn't in the club anymore and asked a mate about it; apparently to all members it appears as though I am active and still owner of the club, but in my client I can't see the club, and I can't get an invite back into the club because apparently I'm still the owner and so no member can recommend me to the club...

plz fix thanks rito

replies.body: I have this as well been about a month now its stupid

The same bug happened to me (still is) i cannot access my singed main club (WHICH SUCKS AS THE PRESEASON JUST STARTED) I messaged riot support and they said they are aware of the problem and will be working on the fix soon
